definition: on tiptoe or as if on tiptoe, walking on the tips of ones's toes so as to make no noise, the tip of a toe, walk on one's toes
details:
adverb
- on tiptoe or as if on tiptoe
= example: on tiptoe or as if on tiptoe
adjective
- walking on the tips of ones's toes so as to make no noise
= example: walking on the tips of ones's toes so as to make no noise
noun
- the tip of a toe
verb
- walk on one's toes
= synonyms: tip, tippytoe
